channel.title: Talk on Jasmeet Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Talk on Jasmeet Singh

item.title: ROSCon India 2023
item.author: jasmeet0915@gmail.com (Jasmeet Singh)
item.description: Presented my GSoC’23 project, “Automatic Computation of Moments of Inertia of SDFormat Links,” with the Gazebo team at Open Robotics

item.title: ROS Meetup, IIT Delhi'22
item.author: jasmeet0915@gmail.com (Jasmeet Singh)
item.description: Showcased my internship project at Acceleration Robotics India about developing custom plugins and 3D models for open world outdoor simulations in Gazebo

item.title: Raspberry Pi Jam 2020
item.author: jasmeet0915@gmail.com (Jasmeet Singh)
item.description: Gave a talk on how to set up and use Pi Clusters with a simple python example of calculating integrals with message passing between the different Raspberry Pi 3s
